text: If you wrote this yourself and it doesn't contain code from other files, feel free to just add yourself here!
title: (2, '', u'astroid/tests/unittest_brain_numpy.py')

text: Hey @PCManticore, the CI passes but just because i added a decorator to skip the untittest concerning `numpy` if the `numpy` module is not present. Does it mean that those unittests are never executed in the CI (because tox env doesn't install numpy)?
title: nan

text: @hippo91 apparently that's true! https://github.com/PyCQA/astroid/blob/7bfb5e83b162d2126c9929b6d863724176269b6d/tox.ini#L14 we weren't installing numpy for pypy and py3.3
title: nan

text: Merged since the missing numpy doesn't block this PR. We'll handle this in its own change.
title: nan
